original_title: Dennis DeYoung and the Music of Styx - Live in Los Angeles
overview: On March 18th, 2014, Dennis DeYoung, the legendary front man of Styx and author of five key songs that define that band s career, returned to Los Angeles for the first time during his solo career to play a sold out show at the El Rey Theater. Recorded live for AXS-TV and captured in pristine HD quality, the performance has been slated for release via Frontiers Records.
title: Dennis DeYoung and the Music of Styx - Live in Los Angeles
